story:
BRIEFLY

Love blues? Love old skool blues? Love acoustic blues? 
Award winning blues and roots artist Sunday wilde is about to release her sixth album, recorded over three sessions, one in Memphis, TN and two in Clarksdale Mississippi.
10 Songs are on the new album; some originals (overdrinking momma's, mad men driving us crazy, troubles are endless....just some of the THEMES) and some covers; Willie Dixon's 'John the Conquer Root', Ruth Brown's 'Daddy Daddy', Louis Jordan's 'Early in the Morning', Bessie Smith's 'Sorrowful Blues and more.
Produced by 2x Grammy nominated Producer Gary Vincent from Vincent Productions, and Gary also works with Charlie Musselwhite and Morgan Freeman to name a few.
With a STELLAR group of musicians on ALL acoustic instruments.
  • Reno Jack - Upright BASS and a romantic DUET with Sunday
  • Rickey "Quicksand" Martin - Drums
  • Billy Earheart - 1857 estey Cottage Pump Organ
  • Watermelon Slim - some super cool backup backtalkin'
  • Sturgis Nikides - dobro
  • April Mae - Washboard
  • Johnny Cass - acoustic guitar
  • Roger Reupert - trumpet
  • Mandy Lemons - backup vocals
  • Robert Hughes - acoustic guitar
  • Dave Fecca - acoustic guitar




What We Need & What You Get

Recording is DONE, Mastering is DONE, Artwork is DONE. 

We are just looking for a bit more assistance from the fans, friends, and blues supporters to help us with the publicity and promotion, which includes mailing costs and advertising costs, so we can reach out to a few more opportunites like print advertising ..... we are hoping we can do this by offering a few unique  perks to you, and/ or the album when its released (July 15 Soft Launch)

In the perks you will see a few special items like PURE Canadian Maple Syrup, LB of Wild Rice, and a selection of promo items like HWY 11 Records matchbooks. 

The Impact

We have had successful campaigns in the past to assist with an album launch, and so much great success with previous albums here is a quick list of some of the accomplishments of prior releases;

  • #1 on Siriusxm Radio BB King's Bluesville (He gave me a blue nightgown 2013)
  • 2x Winner of the Independent Music Awards Best Blues Voters Choice 
  • 2x Winner of the Best International Blues Release Blues411
  • Honorable Mention winner for the International Songwriting Competition
  • Runner up Best Acoustic Blues Album - Wasser Prawda GR
  • #1 on Amazon best sellers for Classic Female blues with two releases
  • in the top 100 Blues albums of the year for the Roots Music Report
  • worldwide radio play on roots and blues stations

Other Ways You Can Help

Many people are old skool and don't want to use the online purchase areas, and we completely understand. But if you still want to help financially, please get in touch. If you still want to help please share the LINK and Also..... like follow or share any of the posts, music players and more. Or review the music on itunes!

story:
Who We Are

We are Le VICE, an Urban Alternative band based out of the Bay Area.  We have been creating music and performing together for close to 10 years now and are on the brink of releasing our best project yet!

What We Are CREATING

We have spent the last year working on an EP entitled "Boys & Girls".  The album art and recorded music aspects are in their final steps, and one music video has been completed, but we have one last visual portion to create.  A live performance + music video mash up that features the entire album! In other words, a visual album (think LEMONADE), but with a live performance being the main attraction.

This particular portion of "Boys & Girls" is the icing on the cake because it allows people to not only hear our music but to SEE us PERFORM it.

A contribution to this campaign can MAKE our vision a reality.  

So What Do We Need and What Will Your Contributions Do?

So, this is what we need and what you will be helping us get! :)

  • Rental of Venue - We will be shooting the live performance portion of the video at The Clock Factory in Berkeley, CA and will need to rent it for 2 days.
  • Engineer, Producer and Rental of Recording Equipment- The live recordings are just as important as the visual components of this video. So we will have to rent recording equipment as well as hire an engineer to record it and a producer to create the final version of the live recordings.
  • Film Crew- This includes directors, director of photography, producers, art director, set director, camera operators and assistants, production sound mixer, lighting technician, key grip, wardrobe/stylist, make-up artist, hair stylist, actors, and editor.  We will need all of these people for two different shoots.  First the live performance shoot and then the storyline shoot. 
  • Set Production - Both portions of the Video will need to have set designs; this includes painting, projections, space rentals and car rental (for storyline portion) and props.

What You Get!

We have a bunch of perks for donating! Scroll back up the screen and check them out!!

The Impact

By helping us fund this project, you are helping us achieve our biggest goals by enabling us to fully manifest our passion for our art.  

Check out some of our previous Videos!  Many of these were made with very little budget and lots of favors, so with an actual budget this time, just imagine what we could create!







Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that sometimes you just don't have the money and can't help financially (we know alllll about it) but there are definitely other ways you can help!

  • SHARE SHARE SHARE! Help us spread the word about our campaign by sharing it with your friends and family! Especially your Rich Uncle Herbert who has more money than the law allow and loves music!
  • ADD us on our Social Media Sites, like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!
-Le VICE Facebook Page
-Le VICE Twitter
-Le VICE Instagram

THANKS AGAIN FOR YOUR TIME, WE KNOW YOU'RE BUSY AND WE TRULY APPRECIATE YOU!
Love,
Le VICE

story:
Hello Everyone!
       Thanks to your endless support for my music, the last album was a great success. Not only did it exceed my expectations, but I learned more than I could have imagined in the process!
       Since its early 2014 release, my first solo album has been featured on multiple press outlets including The Bluegrass Situation, Country Standard Time, and CMT's "The Edge." I have gained national recognition among other musicians who humble me with their company. Performers I look up to suddenly know who I am and I have stepped this music hobby up to the next amazing level.
        I have been busy the past couple years writing new songs and preparing to put out another noteworthy piece of work, but the process is still daunting:
I had someone tell me, "Good luck on topping that last album," which was a great compliment, but also terrifying.  I struggled with how I would put together this next step and if I even knew what I wanted to do.

      Topping the last album is exactly what I intend to do.

      However, doing so requires a calculated plan and a solid budget, which I hope to subsidize with your support. Right now what is needed is a financial cushion that allows me to pay both for the studio and recording engineers and the promotional tools needed to make the album not only sound great, but be successful in today's market.The most challenging part of this whole process is being able to fund promotion, studio time, AND production costs all at once before the album is salable, which is why I am asking for your help!

       I am making music all the time, but in order for you and the rest of the world to hear it, I need to be able to spend money in the right places to put it into your ears! I will try to update this section with as many details as I can as they come to light but, in the meantime, please know that your generosity will help me every step of the way as I move forward. Thank you so much for your time, your appreciation of my music, and for sharing this and it with your friends!

story:
*ΔΕΙΤΕ ΤΟ ΒΙΝΤΕΟ ΠΑΡΑΠΑΝΩ - Ακολουθεί κείμενο στα ελληνικά

Eventhough things are hard in Greece we decided that we are going to continue making this CD. We thank all the contributors and we are going to send them their perks as we promised. They will hear from us soon. Art can keep us alive and happy. 


DEAR FRIENDS

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT
*This campaign might restart again later this year.


Things are difficult for artists in Greece

I am Apostolis Armagos. A new composer who lives in Athens-Greece. I have composed some new songs and I am trying to create my third cd. Markos Kritikos wrote the lyrics. 

I am very lucky to have a really great male voice for my project, Nikos Venetakis. Nikos is from the beautiful island of Crete and his voice is totally original. When I listen to him, I travel to the island. I want to use traditional Greek musical instruments. My songs are based on traditional Greek music. You might call it ethnic or folk.

We have started some recordings in a small studio in the center of Athens, near the Acropolis, and we hope that the recordings will finish in September. Although the musicians that participate are friends, I believe that they must be payed. We also have to pay the studio, the sound engineer and of course the production of the discs.

  


Things are very hard in Greece now, because of the crisis, and musicians that record their music have to pay everything by themselves.

If I collect 5.000 euros I will manage to pay my studio, musicians and a part of the disc production. If I collect less, i will pay... a part of all those. 


I am really excited about this 10 songs album.

All of my friends believe that, if finished, this will be a really good Cd. And I believe it too. I also think it will be very interesting for non Greek people, because it uses Greek instruments: lute, cretan lyra, bouzouki, greek percussion, etc. And Nikos Venetakis is a really great vocalist. You must meet him. 



For contributing to the album you will get some items

Ι must say that, even if you have very little to offer it is important for me. 


Thank you.

If you can't contribute, please tell your friends about my campaign, and share it.

This is my website: www.apostolisarmagos.com

Please note

**FOR THE PERKS THAT REQUIRE SHIPPING, IF YOU FORGOT TO ADD IT INTO YOUR CONTRIBUTION, PLEASE JUST MAKE A NO PERK CONTRIBUTION FOR THE PROPER SHIPPING AMOUNT. Shipping charges are not included in the price of the items and must be manually added by you upon check out

 ***NOTE ABOUT SIZES:  FOR THE TWO PERKS THAT INCLUDE SHIRTS, PLEASE WRITE YOUR SIZE NEXT TO YOUR NAME WHEN YOU ENTER IT.  IF YOU'VE ALREADY ORDERED AND FORGOT TO INCLUDE YOUR SIZE, WE WILL CONTACT YOU BY EMAIL.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Γεια σας!

Ονομάζομαι Αποστόλης Αρμάγος. Είμαι συνθέτης και τραγουδοποιός και αυτήν την περίοδο προσπαθώ να ηχογραφήσω το τρίτο μου CD. Πρόκειται για έναν δίσκο που θα περιλαμβάνει δέκα τραγούδια σε μουσική δική μου και στίχους του συνεργάτη μου Μάρκου Κρητικού. Είμαι πολύ χαρούμενος που ερμηνευτής αυτών των κομματιών είναι ένα νέο παιδί, ο Νίκος Βενετάκης,  ο οποίος πιστεύω ότι μπορεί να πάει πολύ ψηλά.

Ο δίσκος έχει ύφος παραδοσιακό

Αν σας αρέσει η παραδοσιακή μουσική και τα παραδοσιακά μουσικά όργανα πιστεύω ότι ο δίσκος αυτός μπορεί και να σας ενθουσιάσει. Λαούτα, κρητικές λύρες, νταούλια και μια φωνή γνήσια και αυθεντική, νομίζω ότι δημιουργούν ένα πολύ καλό αποτέλεσμα.


Όπως όλοι ξέρουμε

τα πράγματα στην Ελλάδα είναι πολύ δύσκολα αυτή την εποχή, για όλους. Εάν παρόλ' αυτά μπορείτε να συνεισφέρετε έστω και κάτι μικρό, για μας είναι πολύ σημαντικό. Είμαι από αυτούς που πιστεύουν ότι στα δύσκολα η τέχνη μπορεί να βοηθήσει τον καθένα μας να αισθανθεί καλύτερα. Είναι μια πολύ καλή διέξοδος.


Τι θα λάβετε εάν βοηθήσετε

Όπως θα δείτε και στο πλάι της σελίδας, εάν συνεισφέρετε στην προσπάθειά μας θα λάβετε κάποια δώρα. 


- Με 2 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε ψηφιακά 1 τραγούδι του δίσκου

- Με 10 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε ψηφιακά τα τραγούδια του δίσκου

- Με 30 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε το δισκάκι

- Με 50 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε ψηφιακά τα τραγούδια του δίσκου καθώς και ένα t-shirt είδικά σχεδιασμένο για την καμπάνια με σχέδια από ελληνικά μουσικά όργανα (κρητική λύρα, λαούτο κτλ.)

- Με 100 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε το cd, το t-shirt καθώς και ένα πλεκτό χειροποίητο βραχιολάκι

- Με 200 ευρώ θα σας στείλουμε το cd καθώς και ένα κόσμημα-αντίγραφο του δίσκου της Φαιστού από ασήμι.


ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ: η συνεισφορά μπορεί να είναι και διαφορετικό ποσό από τα παραπάνω. Κάθε ποσό είναι εύπρόσδεκτο, όσο μικρό κι αν είναι.

Ακόμα κι αν δεν μπορείτε να συνεισφέρετε

δημοσιεύστε την καμπάνια μου στη σελίδα σας στο Fb ή στείλτε το σχετικό λινκ σε κάποιον που νομίζετε ότι μπορεί να ενδιαφέρεται, είναι κι αυτό πολύ σημαντικό.
Περισσότερα για μένα μπορείτε να δείτε στην ιστοσελίδα
www.apostolisarmagos.com
Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ!

Σημείωση
Για όσα δώρα έχουν έξοδα αποστολής, αυτά θα πρέπει να προστεθούν επιπλέον στο ποσό της δωρεάς. Εάν ξεχάσατε να το κάνετε, κάντε μια επιπρόσθετη δωρεά μόνο με το ποσό για το κόστος αποστολής. Τα έξοδα αποστολής πρέπει να προστεθούν από εσάς καθώς κάνετε check out.
Επίσης, για τα μπλουζάκια, παρακαλούμε γράψτε το νούμερο της μπλούζας (Small, Medium, Large, XLarge) δίπλα στο όνομά σας όταν το καταχωρείτε. Εάν ξεχάσατε να το κάνετε, τότε θα επικοινωνήσουμε μαζί σας με e-mail.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Περισσότερα για μένα μπορείτε να δείτε στην ιστοσελίδα


www.apostolisarmagos.com

Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ!

Σημείωση
Για όσα δώρα έχουν έξοδα αποστολής, αυτά θα πρέπει να προστεθούν επιπλέον στο ποσό της δωρεάς. Εάν ξεχάσατε να το κάνετε, κάντε μια επιπρόσθετη δωρεά μόνο με το ποσό για το κόστος αποστολής. Τα έξοδα αποστολής πρέπει να προστεθούν από εσάς καθώς κάνετε check out.
Επίσης, για τα μπλουζάκια, παρακαλούμε γράψτε το νούμερο της μπλούζας (Small, Medium, Large, XLarge) δίπλα στο όνομά σας όταν το καταχωρείτε. Εάν ξεχάσατε να το κάνετε, τότε θα επικοινωνήσουμε μαζί σας με e-mail.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
NEW PERK--- TSHIRT

Here is the the design Joey made herself for the T-Shirt. These will be special edition for the campaign and will not be sold elsewhere.



Short Summary

I am so thankful for all my supporters from American Idol, and now it is time to give back with my first BIG GIRL ALBUM! My first album was recorded and produced on my iPhone before I appeared on Idol, but I know I can do better, so here I am.

Before my time on Idol, I was making a living as a street busker in New Orleans, which means I just made what I needed to survive. In order to produce the quality album that I want to produce, I need proper funding. Sadly, not the kind of money I would find in a hat at the end of a shift. So, I am turning to you, my fans, my kiwis, to help me.

I checked around and the costs are high, as you would imagine. With the help of some professionals in the industry, I have come up with a figure that will help me to produce and distribute the type of album I can be proud of, as well as hit the road and perform it live in as many of your cities as possible.

That being said, of course, I plan to give something back to you all for you wonderful donations. I have come up with a list of gifts I can give to each of you for your support. If you don’t see anything you like, let me know, and I will find something to send as a thank you!

This Big Girl Album is for you, my kiwis.

What We Need

I will need studio time, musicians, engineers, and producers. I will also need help with marketing, promotion, and distribution. I am just one girl with an ever growing group of volunteers, but clearly I can't do this on my own. My hope is to get enough funding that enables me to produce an album I can be proud of, and to tour as many cities across the U.S. to perform my album and meet as many of you as I can.

The Impact

If you followed me on American Idol, I looked a little starstruck in the beginning, and I still am. The day that my grandfather talked me into auditioning for American Idol, I never could have imagined that I would not only make it onto the show as a contestant, but that I would make it as far as I did.

Throughout the process, you all helped me believe in myself. I have a book coming out about my personal journey, about all of the ups and downs. It wasn't easy! You made me believe that dreams can come true, and that anything is possible. You have all given me so much, and asked for so little in return. It is time for me to release my own album and come to your cities to perform it.

You helped me get to a 7th place finish on American Idol, you sent me your love via social media, and now I turn to you again.

So many people have told me how I have touched and even changed their lives, just by being myself. I knew I was weird and quirky before American Idol, but now I know I am not alone. Let’s take #teamKiwi to a new level!

I realize that I am asking a lot, but this is what it will take to produce a high quality album, and a subsequent tour. I have carefully selected perks that I feel you guys would appreciate. Regardless of whether or not I reach my goal, I will ensure that each of you receives a token of my thanks. If I don't reach my goal, it will just take a little longer, but this album WILL happen. Ideally, the album will be released in 2016, hopefully earlier than later.

Other Ways You Can Help

Social Media is a powerful tool, as I learned during my time on Idol, maybe even moreso afterwards. People all around the world have been contacting me and asking how they can help. This campaign is your chance. Kiwi Nation is growing, and social media assistance is just as important. I need to you guys to spread the word. Use the Indiegogo share tools, retweet on twitter, repost on Instagram, share on facebook, and any other platforms you can think of! Also, if you know of any clubs or venues in your area that support live music, please, please, please, let me know! I've said it a million times, and I will say it again: I could not do any of this without you, and I promise not to let you down. Stay Posi, Stay Weird, Stay You. <3 #KiwisForLife

story:
Hello!

My artist name is youarekitten :) and I'm a singer-songwriter based in London, UK. I've been playing music for nearly 10 years. Music has always been a diary for my thoughts, feelings and realisations, a form of processing something before moving onto the next thing in life and it’s a lot of fun too. It’s a very addictive form of expression I must say, and I’m glad when people enjoy it as well.

The Album

This particular album titled Seagull is about a breakdown, human relationships and various perspectives people in those relationships can have. It’s about how one thing can relate to another. But it is still conveyed in a light manner hence the title Seagull. This unfathomable relationship between the king of air and the sea, the relationship between selfishness and selflessness, between power and vulnerability, between good and evil, is a theme that I explore here.

Currently the album is at 30 percent of its completion. However after months of writing I've come to realise that I can't complete this album to the level that it deserves, without the community and your support. And so, I'm humbly reaching out to you. It is also a chance for you to be part of something extraordinary!

Challenges

The biggest challenge is to set out the time, space and finances to do the actual recording, mixing and adding multiple instruments to the song till it sounds perfect. There's also a significant amount of time spent on rehearsing and finding out the sound for each song.

As any creative process, it's always unpredictable and full of surprises but I trust that it will come to a fruition.

Sharing

Besides funding, it would be extremely helpful if you send a personal message about this campaign to three of your best friends who share passion for music.

story:
Allo!!!!! Je suis Olivier Bélisle. Pour ceux et celles qui ne me connaissent pas, ça fait pas mal d'années que je joue de la musique dans différents projets. J'ai lancé mon premier album en 2012. Depuis, tu m'as peut-être vu au Quai des Brumes, au Divan Orange, aux Francouvertes, au concours village en chanson de petite-Vallée, ou à suer mes cordes de guitare avec le groupe Canailles ou au défunt Pizza Madonna. Bref, je ne suis pas que ça mais beaucoup. Maintenant, 2015, le temps est venu d'enregistrer mon prochain disque mais pour l'instant je n'ai aucun financement quelconque pour produire cette chose, cette précieuse chose...

Le studio est réservé pour la fin août. Les gens avec qui je veux travailler sont prêts. Les chansons sont prêtes. Ça s'enligne pour un bel album avec de belles collaborations. Une sortie en novembre prochain serait le plan. 

Je profite de cette approche de sociofinancement pour demander votre aide à concrétiser ce projet! Je vous demande ici une somme de 5000$. Ce montant est environ la moitié de ce que j'ai réellement besoin. Pourquoi je ne demande pas 10 000$ alors? Parce que 5000$ c'est déjà immensément gentil de votre part et j'ai fait des demandes de subventions pour amasser le reste. On s'entend que demander une bourse et/ou des subventions dans le domaine des arts, avec le nombre de demandes qu'ils reçoivent, c'est ultra contingenté et je ne peux me fier pas là-dessus. Dans le cas où le refus est global au niveau de mes demandes de subventions, le 5000$ que vous pourriez me donner va tout simplement sauver la vie de cet album! Ça va faire la job en coupant par-ci par-là avec comme résultat final, un album et du plaisir!

En fait c'est comme une prévente d'album + d'autres surprises!


Crédit photo: Luca Pharand qui capte et vous montre comment Olivier écrit sur un banc d'auto.


Donc pour les contreparties en échange de votre participation:

À 20$ de votre part, je vous donne l'album lors du lancement qui aura lieu en novembre. À venir chercher lors du lancement ou bien il vous sera envoyé par la poste.

À 40$ de votre part, je vous donne l'album lors du lancement (ou par la poste) et vous allez participer à un concert en solo gratuit dans un endroit inusité de Montréal. Vous aurez les détails une semaine avant via votre courriel.

À 200$ et plus de votre part, je vous donne tout ce qui est énuméré au-dessus (album + concert surprise) + je vous invite bien cordialement chez moi. Je prépare ma meilleure recette de (chuuuut....) et un beau jam durant le reste de la soirée. C'est quand même assez spectaculaire comme proposition! Concours de selfie en chest en moins.


Donc merci à l'avance! Bien hâte à tout ça! Ça va faire du bien des sortir ces tounes là! 

Merci infiniment d'encourager la relève musicale d'ici!

story:
Who am I?

Hi! My name is Alana Klatt. I'm a singer/songwriter/worship leader with a deep passion and desire to release my voice and songs to the world!

I want to record an album full of songs that are raw in vulnerability, honest about the process, and fierce about God's hope & goodness.

Phase II

My goal for Phase II?To raise the remaining $2200 to complete and record my next 3 songs in studio. This will cover the recording process, hiring musicians, production, and studio costs.

I am privileged to continue working with producer Ryan Worsley and hit songwriter Laurell Barker to produce my next 3 songs! 

Ryan is a Vancouver-based producer and the mastermind behind Echoplant Sound Studio. Ryan has worked with artists such as Dear Rouge and other worship artists locally and globally. His ability to take a song from its raw form and actualize it with colour and contour is effortless! Ryan just landed himself a nomination for Best Producer at the Western Canadian Music Awards. So exciting!

Laurell is a prolific songwriter and recording artist with more than 6 chart-topping songs to her name. She is passionate about artist development and has lent herself to co-writing this album with me! I am so grateful for her influence and her heart for this project!

The Why :: Impact

My hopes for this album:

1) That it would be a blessing to the local church.

2) That it would touch people in times of personal worship and encounter with Jesus.

3) That it would reach anyone who finds themselves in a season of struggle - that they would hear God's voice of HOPE and be drawn into a tangible experience of His mighty love.

story:
^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^               Version française plus bas           ^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^


ENGLISH VERSION

If Christian Death and Marilyn Manson had an electro project together, it would probably sounds like Chemical Sweet Kid !!

It's a long time we are talking about it and our third album "The Speed Of Time" is now ready ! As you probably guess, it will be about the time passing by, feelings and regrets you can have about it. But, the main difference with our other albums is that we decided to add some guitars on almost all songs. So get ready for a little bit more electro industrial & rock n' roll music !



Our new album

Tracklist CD:

  1. 00:00 am
  2. Once Again
  3. No Emotion
  4. The Next Chapter
  5. Kiss My Hate
  6. From The Darkness
  7. Illusion
  8. Precious Time
  9. Disillusion
  10. Rewind
  11. The Sound Of Life
  12. Thousand Words
  13. Your Silence Is Full Of Words


What we need and what you get

To make it happens, we would need 3000€.

This money will help us for manufacturing CD's, paying extra costs such as design, mix and mastering but also for promoting the release of the album by advertising and sending it to DJ’s.

If you want to help us, please check out the different offers that we have for you on the right side of this page. We prepared for you some nice exclusive packages like limited edition posters and T-shirts, Meet & Greet, private show or even one afternoon into Julien’s studio for a music or mix/mastering lesson as you want. Pick the one you like the most and also inform your friends on Facebook, Twitter etc. about this IndieGoGo campaign.

If we raise more funds than expected, this will allow us to get more promotion and touring with the band. if we don't reach our goal, we will have to reevaluate how we are planning to release and promote this third record.

YOU WILL MAKE THE DIFFERENCE AND DECIDE HOW AMAZING THE RELEASE OF THIS RECORD MUST BE !


T-shirt designs


                                  Limited edition "Raven" T-shirt & poster

Available for men and women
Sizes : S-M-L-XL


                                                    "Hourglass" T-shirt

Available for men and women
Sizes : S-M-L


* If you order a T-shirt, please don't forget to click on "Contact" below the video at the top of this page to send us a message with your choice : which model, the size, for man or woman.


Packages 
All items will be shipped at the end of the campaign



Other ways to help us

Not sure yet if you want to be part of it or simply can't afford it ? No worries, there is so many ways you can helps us !

How ? Spread the word & share the project.

You can also share our official Facebook page and all the links you will find in it including our videoclip and the soundcloud snippets of our tracks.


History of the band

Since 2008, the band evolves in a dark and dancing universe. Gloomy and melodic at the same time, the power of the songs comes with a dreary atmosphere and distorted beats, all of this cradled by the voice of Julien Kidam, sometimes aggressive, sometimes quiet but always angry and obscure.

After their first album Tears Of Pain in 2011, the german label Danse Macabre released Broken Wings in 2012. In this second album, the electro is violently merging with sounds close to the guitars riffs all along the 13 songs of an industrial dark electro rock. Each of these albums were followed by some free digital remixes albums.

The band really expresses itself with energetic shows on stage and is proud, with 7 years of existence, to have shared the stage with bands such as Hocico, The Young Gods, Punish Yourself, Tamtrum, and soon (in January) withTyske Ludder.

CSK has recently been endorsed by the brand Hyraw clothing and can't wait to share this new opus with you!


Still available

The promotion of the new album began with the single"Kiss My Hate" and its videoclip :


The rest will be written by you. 


                                ^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^


VERSION FRANÇAISE

Si Christian Death et Marilyn Manson avaient donné naissance à un projet electro, il aurait certainement sonné comme Chemical Sweet Kid !!


Voilà déjà quelques temps que nous en parlions et nous y sommes enfin… Notre troisième album "The Speed of Time" est finalement prêt ! Comme vous l’avez probablement deviné, il traitera du temps qui passe, des sentiments et regrets que nous pouvons ressentir face à lui. Mais ce qui le démarque des précédents albums est que nous avons décidé d’ajouter de la guitare sur presque tous les morceaux. Alors tenez-vous prêts pour un moment musical bien plus industriel et rock’n’roll !



Notre nouvel album

Liste des titres du CD:

  1. 00:00 am
  2. Once Again
  3. No Emotion
  4. The Next Chapter
  5. Kiss My Hate
  6. From The Darkness
  7. Illusion
  8. Precious Time
  9. Disillusion
  10. Rewind
  11. The Sound Of Life
  12. Thousand Words
  13. Your Silence Is Full Of Words

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Pour concrétiser ce projet, nous avons besoin de 3000€.

Cet argent nous aidera à payer la production du CD, les coûts pour le design, le mix et mastering et à promouvoir sa sortie par des publicités et son envoi à des DJs.

Si vous souhaitez nous aider, jetez un oeil sur les différentes contreparties que nous vous proposons sur le côté droit, en haut de cette page (packages en français ci-dessous). Nous vous avons préparé quelques packs bien sympas et exclusifs comme des posters et des T-shirts en édition limitée, un Meet & Greet pour partager un verre, un show privé ou encore une après-midi dans le studio de Julien pour un cours de musique ou de mix/mastering à votre convenance. Choisissez celui que vous aimez le plus et informez vos amis sur Facebook, Twitter etc. de l'existence de cette campagne IndieGoGo.

Si nous obtenons plus de fonds que la somme demandée, cela nous permettra d’investir davantage dans la publicité et les déplacements du groupe pour ses concerts. Dans le cas contraire, nous aurons à réévaluer les conditions de sortie de ce troisième album.

VOUS FEREZ DONC LA DIFFÉRENCE ET DÉCIDEREZ AU COMBIEN LA SORTIE DE CET ALBUM  DOIT ÊTRE INCROYABLE !


Designs des T-shirts


                                 T-shirt & poster "Raven" en édition limitée

Disponible pour homme et femme
Tailles : S-M-L-XL


                                               T-shirt "Hourglass"

Disponible pour homme et femme
Tailles : S-M-L

* Si vous commandez un t-shirt, n'oubliez pas de cliquer sur "Contact" sous la vidéo en haut de la page pour nous envoyer un message avec votre choix : modèle, taille, homme ou femme.


Packages

Toutes les contreparties seront envoyées à la fin de la campagne



D'autres façons de nous aider

Vous n’êtes pas encore sûrs de vouloir faire partie de ce projet ou vous ne pouvez pas vous permettre d’y participer financièrement ? Pas d’inquiétude, il y a bien d’autres moyens de nous aider !

Comment ? Passez le mot et partagez ce projet.

Vous pouvez également partager notre page Facebook et tous les liens que vous y trouverez, comme notre vidéoclip ou les extraits soundcloud de nos morceaux.


Histoire du groupe

Depuis 2008, le groupe évolue dans un univers sombre, énergique et dansant. Á la fois sinistre et mélodique, la puissance des morceaux s’imprègne d’une ambiance ténébreuse aux beats saturés, bercée par la voix de Julien Kidam, tantôt agressive, tantôt posée, mais toujours obscure et furieuse.

Après leur premier album Tears Of Pain en 2011, Broken Wings sort sur le label allemand Danse Macabre en 2012. Dans ce deuxième album, l’électronique s’accouple avec violence à des sonorités proches des riffs de guitares au cours de 13 plages d’un rock industriel délicieusement dark. Chacun de ces deux opus a été suivi par un album de remixes proposé en téléchargement libre.

Mais c’est sur scène à travers un show des plus énergique que le groupe s’exprime réellement. Fort de ses 7 ans d'existence et fier d'avoir pu partager l'affiche avec des groupes tels que Hocico, The Young Gods, Punish Yourself, Tamtrum et bientôt (en janvier) Tyske Ludder.

CSK a récemment été endorsé par la marque de T-Shirt HYRAW Clothing et a hâte de vous livrer son dernier opus !



Déjà disponible

Nous avons débuté la promotion du nouvel album par le single "Kiss My Hate" et son clip vidéo :



La suite s'écrira grâce à vous.
story_txt:
^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^               Version française plus bas           ^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^
 

 ENGLISH VERSION


If
Christian Death and Marilyn Manson had an electro project together, it would
probably sounds like Chemical Sweet Kid !!





It's a
long time we are talking about it and our third album "The Speed Of
Time" is now ready ! As you probably guess, it will be about the time
passing by, feelings and regrets you can have about it. But, the main
difference with our other albums is that we decided to add some guitars on
almost all songs. So get ready for a little bit more electro industrial &
rock n' roll music !
Our new album





Tracklist CD:
00:00 am
Once Again
No Emotion
The Next Chapter
Kiss My Hate
From The Darkness
Illusion
Precious Time
Disillusion
Rewind
The Sound Of Life
Thousand Words
Your Silence Is Full Of Words

What we need and what you get

To make
it happens, we would need 3000€.This
money will help us for manufacturing CD's, paying extra costs such as design, mix and mastering but also for promoting the release of the album by advertising and
sending it to DJ’s.
If
 you want to help us, please check 
out the different offers that we have for you on the right side of this 
page. We
prepared for you some nice exclusive packages like limited edition 
posters and
T-shirts, Meet & Greet, private show or even one afternoon into 
Julien’s studio for a music or mix/mastering lesson as you want. Pick the one you like the most and also inform your friends on 
Facebook, Twitter etc. about this IndieGoGo campaign. 
If we
raise more funds than expected, this will allow us to get more promotion and
touring with the band. if we don't reach our goal, we will have to reevaluate
how we are planning to release and promote this third record.
YOU WILL MAKE THE
DIFFERENCE AND DECIDE HOW AMAZING THE RELEASE OF THIS RECORD MUST BE !


T-shirt designs

                                  Limited edition "Raven" T-shirt & poster
Available for men and womenSizes : S-M-L-XL

                                                    "Hourglass" T-shirt
Available for men and womenSizes : S-M-L




* If you order a T-shirt, please don't forget to click on "Contact" below the video at the top of this page to send us a message with your choice : which model, the size, for man or woman.

Packages All items will be shipped at the end of the campaign









Other ways to help us



Not
sure yet if you want to be part of it or simply can't afford it ? No worries,
there is so many ways you can helps us !
How ? Spread
the word & share the project.
You can
also share our official Facebook page and all the links you will find in it
including our videoclip and the soundcloud snippets of our tracks.History of the band
Since 2008, the band evolves in a dark and dancing
universe. Gloomy and melodic at the same time, the power of the songs comes
with a dreary atmosphere and distorted beats, all of this cradled by the voice
of Julien Kidam, sometimes aggressive, sometimes quiet but always angry and
obscure.
After their first album Tears Of Pain in 2011, the
german label Danse Macabre released Broken Wings in 2012. In this second album,
the electro is violently merging with sounds close to the guitars riffs all
along the 13 songs of an industrial dark electro rock. Each of these albums
were followed by some free digital remixes albums.
The band really expresses itself with energetic shows
on stage and is proud, with 7 years of existence, to have shared the stage with
bands such as Hocico, The Young Gods, Punish Yourself, Tamtrum, and soon (in January) withTyske
Ludder. 
CSK has recently been endorsed by the brand Hyraw
clothing and can't wait to share this new opus with you!








Still available
The promotion of the new album began with the single"Kiss My Hate" and its videoclip :

The rest will be written by you. 

                                ^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^^V^ VERSION FRANÇAISESi Christian Death et Marilyn Manson avaient donné naissance à un projet electro, il aurait certainement sonné comme Chemical Sweet Kid !!

Voilà déjà quelques temps que
nous en parlions et nous y sommes enfin… Notre troisième album "The Speed of
Time" est finalement prêt ! Comme vous l’avez probablement deviné, il
traitera du temps qui passe, des sentiments et regrets que nous pouvons
ressentir face à lui. Mais ce qui le démarque des précédents albums est que
nous avons décidé d’ajouter de la guitare sur presque tous les morceaux. Alors tenez-vous prêts pour un moment musical bien plus industriel et
rock’n’roll !

Notre nouvel album

nous avons besoin de 3000€.
Cet argent nous aidera à payer
la production du CD, les coûts pour le design, le mix et mastering et à promouvoir sa
sortie par des publicités et son envoi à des DJs. 
Si vous souhaitez nous aider, jetez un oeil sur les différentes contreparties que nous vous proposons sur le côté droit, en haut de cette page (packages en français ci-dessous). Nous vous avons préparé
quelques packs bien sympas et exclusifs comme des posters et des T-shirts en
édition limitée, un Meet & Greet pour partager un verre, un show privé ou encore une après-midi dans le studio de
Julien pour un cours de musique ou de mix/mastering à votre convenance. Choisissez celui que vous aimez le plus et informez vos amis sur Facebook, Twitter etc. de l'existence de cette campagne IndieGoGo. 
Si nous obtenons plus de fonds
que la somme demandée, cela nous permettra d’investir davantage dans la publicité
et les déplacements du groupe pour ses concerts. Dans le cas contraire, nous aurons à réévaluer les conditions de sortie de ce troisième
album.

story:
Hey Guys! Welcome to our campaign! Some of you know our story and some may not but making music has been a dream in our hearts for the past  few years. We have had the privilege to be able to live out that dream being worship pastors and we decided that the next step was to share the songs that God has given us. 

The estimated cost of this project is $10,000.00. That includes studio time, mixing, masterning and distribution. I know it may seem like a lot but the plan is to release two 6-7 song EP's over the next twelve months.  That's two projects on your iTunes playlist in the next year! 

We really believe that this is the time to start walking down this road, and we also really believe in the songs were writing. If you are a part of our church here in Texas (Messiahs House) then you know some of the songs we plan to put out there. They are songs about God's heart, songs about who He is to us, and simply put, songs of worship. 

If you aren't able to financially contribute,  we would so appreciate your prayers as we move forward with the project! We would also love your help to spread the news about it! 

Thank you!

The Perkins

story:
Axes. Accents. Drakes abounding. Beavers. And Biebers. And plaid, draped across the landscape like a chessboard where the only piece left is the Queen.  Behold:  Canada. 

Bored by our borders, Nosy Mangabe has decided to wrest itself from the red, white, and blue womb of Lady Liberty, and, with an umbilical chord or two, march onwards towards the open arms of America’s hot cousin (this, of course, is not climatically speaking).  We’ve sprouted in the land of the free, but, now, we wish to venture forth, to the land of the freezing.

Who We Manga-Be...

With dual ukes, uncontainable harmonies, bass, guitar, and drums in tow,            Nosy Mangabe is a whimsy-pop, bubblegum-jazz ensemble, that, contrary to what its genre markers would indicate, is not sponsored by any concession-stand food manufacturers. 

We are embarking on this musical mission in the interest of propelling forward modern pop music, which we feel lacks a certain Je ne se Quoi... And, from what we’ve heard, certain parts of a Canada know what Quoi means, so we’re heading there to make a statement in the musical landscape that we feel compelled to share with the world.  We are the profit-less prophets that wish to spread the gospel of whimsy-pop before the coming of the a-pop-calypse.

After spending so much time refining what we love, we now want to venture out into the world and unite it with whom we love:  Our Fans!  Thanks to the love and donations of so many of fans last spring, we were able to pollinate the East Coast with our tunes (this effort was not particularly well-embraced by fans with pollen allergies), lovingly doling out tid-bits of tunes to the eager and open ears of our awaiting patrons like mother birds feeding their young.  However, our tendency to dispense music instead of worms made us slightly less-than-popular at any gigs that we played for actual baby birds. 

Though we loved travelling cross-country, this time we'd like to cross countries and get Canada's toes tapping faster than her Maple plantations.  

Albeit we might seem like a bore-realis in contrast to the Northern Lights, we know that if given the opportunity, we can charm them with our de-lights from the south. 

After all, what more whimsical place is there than Canada: A land where they have animals such as the Beaver, which is essentially an aquatic squirrel with a canoe paddle grafted onto it, and where the sky dances with green at night, turning skies in other countries green with envy.  Like vampires of the flora, the people there rejoice in drinking the sweetened blood of trees, and their official head of state is the Queen of a country to which they don’t belong.  Realistically-speaking, Canada is surrealistic, and, for this reason, Canada and whimsy-pop were meant to be.  Mangabe.

Sincerely and with love,

Nosy Mangabe

Friends with Mangabenefits:

While we've never been good at answering questions such as, "How many Musicians does it take to change a light bulb?" we can answer the question of "How many dollars will it take to move a band all the way to Canada for a week-long tour?"  The answer is $4000. 

The costs break down as follows:

  • Rental car
  • Gas
  • Renting venues
  • Food (6 members worth of it!)
  • Lodging 
  • Silkscreening Nosy Mangabe T-shirts
  • Graphic Design for Album Art 
  • Producing & Packaging EPs

Of course, though they say that it's better to give than receive, receiving is still pretty fun, and we're going to make sure that everyone that gives something will receive something exchange.  Our benefactors will receive everything from albums to personal, original compositions created in their honor.

Even if we don't reach our target amount, any contribution will help to defray the cost of the tour, and prove invaluable in our mission to unite our music with our fan base.

The amount of gratitude we feel for your assistance is immeasurable (mainly, because scientists have been way too lazy about developing a gratitude-ometer), and though words might fail us in demonstrating how thankful we are, we promise you, our music won't. 

The Impact

This is your opportunity to become a modern-day Medici; a patron of the arts for what it costs to be the patron of a cup of coffee.  

If you like our music, and would like to know that you were instrumental in the cross-pollination of new forms of art and sonic design, we encourage you to donate today!  

Spread the Word!

Even if your coffers are bare, you can still help!  Money talks, but so do people:  Talk to your friends about us, share our Indiegogo link on your Facebook feed, tattoo our name on the small of your back, name your children after us, carve our name onto the side of the moon using a highly-advance laser (though, if you can afford a highly-advanced laser, you can probably afford to make a donation), or run outside and shout about us to the heavens!  Just help us spread the word, and we'll take care of the rest!

story:
What's happening?

I’m going to Berlin on September 1st, to stay indefinitely. I’ve visited Europe recently, for singing projects and auditions, and it’s a very exciting market with a lot of opportunities for artistic growth— from small churches in the countryside with fabulous music programs to world class opera houses. I can’t wait to be there and see what kinds of artistic opportunities I’ll be able to create and take advantage of. 


What's so important about singing?

As a scientist, I learned a lot about objective analysis, but feelings make the world go round. Human beings are not always rational actors, and the arts give dimension and compassion to our humanity. To make a piece of music come to life-- to be in service of music-- is a joyful and gigantic task. Music has structure, architecture, colors, and so many inummerable details that doing it justice, giving it immediate emotional urgency, requires strict and generous attention to craft. This impossible mission is what I have accepted, happily, as my life's work, and I believe it a worthy pursuit because music gives us a way to connect and empathize with each other, challenge each other, and hear each other. It is vital. 


Why $5000?

I’ve created this campaign to raise $5000 to help with relocation costs, artistic development, and audition travel costs. Once I am in Berlin, I'll be traveling around the country and to other European countries, hiring pianists and other collaborators for auditions. These costs can add up. 

In addition to singing, I’m passionate about education and health, so, I will continue my work as a private academic tutor and health coach while I’m overseas. Through the wonders of technology, I will be able to stay connected to my clients. Your support will be a much appreciated supplement to the funds I’ve been saving and will continue to earn through these other income streams. 


Perks! What contributors get in return:

$20 or more:  You get a ticket to Loves, Adventures and Farewells, a concert I’m giving with soprano Angela Owens and pianist and composer Christopher Cooley, featuring rarely performed duets of Mendelssohn and Schumann. If you can’t attend the concert, you will get a digital recording of highlights. The recital will be Tuesday August 25th at 7:30pm, at the National Opera Center, 330 7th Avenue at W. 29th Street. The program will include a world premiere written by Chris!   

$50 or more: You get the first reward (see above) plus a digital copy of my next independently-produced recording, a collection of opera arias and sacred pieces.

$100 or more: You get the first and second rewards (see above) plus recognition as a Premier Sponsor on my website and in materials for all of my independently-produced events, including August’s concert, through 2016. 

And any donation of any size will get you my everlasting gratitude for your support!

Thanks to fiscal sponsorship through Fractured Atlas, contributions (minus the value of your perk) are tax-deductible. 


Other ways you can help:

If you prefer not to contribute financially, please share this campaign with friends and family, visit my website www.mcguiremezzo.com for updates, and stay connected with me on this journey. I'm so grateful for your support and camaraderie.

story:
Short Summary

Dear all, as many of you know, my radio show Nova elektronika has been famous for bringing new sounds and voices of electronic music to the people of Slovenia every Friday for over a decade. This ended abruptly when the national Radio Slovenia unlawfully terminated my contract and consequentially cancelled the show in the summer of 2013. The lawsuit followed and I've been fighting to bring the show back for two years now. My attorney and the Union of Journalists believe that I stand a good chance, but I now need your help to finally make this happen.

V SLOVENŠČINI NAJDETE CELO ZGODBO TUKAJ: 

http://www.reporter.si/slovenija/mateja-klari%C4%8D-se-v-sodni-bitki-z-rtv-slovenija-ne-predaja/54305

IN TUKAJ

http://podcrto.si/odpuscena-honorarna-sodelavka-rtv-slovenija-z-mnozicnim-financiranjem-zbira-denar-za-odvetnika/

What We Need & What You Get

I've been unemployed for two years now and I cannot afford to pay the fees of my attorney any longer. With that, the show will be over for good and there will be no chance of winning. The problem is that I specialized in electronic music and fully devoted the last decade of my career to it based on the contract with the national Radio Slovenia. This was never supposed to be terminated and my work experience as a result of a decade of full-time work for the RTVS became so specific that I am now unable to find a job anywhere else. I tried at the commercial radios in Slovenia, but they show no appreciation for the less commercial genres of electronic music and were not interested in any kind of cooperation.

The Impact

Without your help, the show will never be broadcasted again. With your help, we can make it happen  - there is a chance to get it back on air and offer you the best new sounds and the best works of Slovenian and international producers again. We can have our show back if we just stand together and make a clear statement that this means something to us! It is easy to become discouraged, but even 1 Euro donations can make a difference at this point, I promise you that.

Risks & Challenges

As with every lawsuit (or anything else in life for that matter) there are no guarantees. No one can 100% guarantee that we will win, but chances are good and I have a strong case well supported by evidence. I would have dropped the case long ago if this weren't so.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to donate, you can help by spreading the word about this campaign and make sure that as many people as possible hear about it. This too would be of great help and deeply appreciated.

Thank you so much for any kind of help and support.

Foto: Miha Rekar (https://www.facebook.com/rekar?fref=ts)
story_txt:
Short Summary Dear all, as many of you know, my radio show Nova elektronika has been famous for bringing new sounds and voices of electronic music to the people of Slovenia every Friday for over a decade. This ended abruptly when the national Radio Slovenia unlawfully terminated my contract and consequentially cancelled the show in the summer of 2013. The lawsuit followed and I've been fighting to bring the show back for two years now. My attorney and the Union of Journalists believe that I stand a good chance, but I now need your help to finally make this happen.
V SLOVENŠČINI NAJDETE CELO ZGODBO TUKAJ: 
http://www.reporter.si/slovenija/mateja-klari%C4%8D-se-v-sodni-bitki-z-rtv-slovenija-ne-predaja/54305
IN TUKAJ
http://podcrto.si/odpuscena-honorarna-sodelavka-rtv-slovenija-z-mnozicnim-financiranjem-zbira-denar-za-odvetnika/
What We Need & What You Get
 I've been unemployed for two years now and I cannot afford to pay the fees of my attorney any longer. With that, the show will be over for good and there will be no chance of winning. The problem is that I specialized in electronic music and fully devoted the last decade of my career to it based on the contract with the national Radio Slovenia. This was never supposed to be terminated and my work experience as a result of a decade of full-time work for the RTVS became so specific that I am now unable to find a job anywhere else. I tried at the commercial radios in Slovenia, but they show no appreciation for the less commercial genres of electronic music and were not interested in any kind of cooperation.
    The Impact Without your help, the show will never be broadcasted again. With your help, we can make it happen  - there is a chance to get it back on air and offer you the best new sounds and the best works of Slovenian and international producers again. We can have our show back if we just stand together and make a clear statement that this means something to us! It is easy to become discouraged, but even 1 Euro donations can make a difference at this point, I promise you that.
    Risks & Challenges As with every lawsuit (or anything else in life for that matter) there are no guarantees. No one can 100% guarantee that we will win, but chances are good and I have a strong case well supported by evidence. I would have dropped the case long ago if this weren't so.
    Other Ways You Can Help If you cannot afford to donate, you can help by spreading the word about this campaign and make sure that as many people as possible hear about it. This too would be of great help and deeply appreciated.
Thank you so much for any kind of help and support.

story:
PFRIENDZ,

 I'm Brittany Pfantz, an indie artist with some big dreams.

 I recently signed a deal to complete three songs with my dream producer. (James Bay, Kings of Leon, Tom Waits, Kaleo) I'm ecstatic! But that means I have to come up with $$$$ by January. Keep reading if ya wanna help a sista out. <3

Venmo @brittanypfantz, paypal brittanyinthesky@gmail.com

 

  • Music found me at the age of 22 with a little ukulele and a lot of words; it's been wild.  God has brought some incredible opportunities to my fingertips; especially since making leaps out of my comfort zone...to MUSIC CITY.  I got a manager and a publishing deal..having a team has helped me so, so much...  Now I have the opportunity to work with an amazing production team, that I could have only dreamed about before. I didn't realize how important production was until I worked with my different people and styles and realized ...production is the music.  So, this opportunity is everything for me.  This man is the best of the best; I feel in my heart of hearts that he is the one I am supposed to work with. His humility, kindness, and down- to- earth-ness is stunning. The way that we came together is destiny. The only thing between me and this opportunity is some money. $$  (although I already signed the deal...so the money will have to come some way or another lol) 

  • My manager and I have been presented with some opportunities to team up with some incredible giants in the industry next year.  We are definitely scoping those out and considering every opportunity.  My goal right now is to see how far we can get this project while being independent.  I know you guys can help me take my music to the next level.  If I have at least 200 people who believe in me...then game on.
  • I have experienced the power of music. I also know that it's critical to hold onto my power in my own music (prince says so), until the right team comes along to support the vision.  
  • With this production team and the songs that will come from it--- I know for sure it will land me on such high ground. I've already met with his team...the inexplainable passion, joy, and unity was unlike anything I've ever felt musically.... This is all so possible, but I need support from you, the PFAM. (insert Uncle Sam poster)

 

What I need + What you get

let me break it down: 

It costs 10K+ to produce and release one song with a producer at this level.  My goal is to do 4 songs.  The money pays for the production, the band, the mixing, mastering, and marketing.  There are so many people involved to get one song out effectively.  I work in a restaurant and every bit of money I have goes towards food, rent, and music.  It's def been worth it to live in Nashville and have to work my butt off in this industry, I have so much more drive and respect now.  You really cant put a price on the years of heart and soul this team has put into their craft.

PERKS: you get to be my current label. The fuel to make the dream work. Partners in this God-dream of mine.  You get my gratitude...I can't do it without you. (unless I get picked up by a label :)

  • If I don't reach my entire goal, I will do as many songs and marketing that the funds will allow.

Lets Make An Impact

I know each of you have been touched by music.  It has the power to bring us together.  Music is one of the biggest ways I connect with people, connect with God, process my feelings, understand others, and the world around me. My gift came to me from above and I want to give it back to the world, to you, to as many people as I can. I've had lots of people reach out with stories of how my music has helped them through breaks ups, divorces, hard times, family issues....that is what keeps me going in this business.. through the ups and downs....more than anything. It's my passion, it's my purpose.  The opportunity I've been presented with blows my mind, I tear up when I talk about it.  I'm overflowing with gratitude. 

  • I have had (very) mild success with campaigns like this, because I didn't have a plan of action, nor the songs, nor the maturity in my craft that I now have.  This project has the potential to take me to another level.  But I need you. 

RISK it for the biscuit.

Pursuing music is a risk.  Especially as an indie artist.  I can't imagine doing anything else.   The reason I believe this project is a financial risk worth taking is because I'm ready.  I've prepared.  I've developed a strong sense of self as writer, a singer, and as an artist.  I am more confident than ever..I've stood in front of greats and stood tall..(I used to have a panic attack when I had to be on stage..now it's home). I've built a team to help me with the creative and the business side of my project.  I have a grammy winning producer who is willing to take a risk on me, who believes in me whole-heartedly. The bones are in place,  The heart beat is here.  Now it's time to make it dance, babyyy.  Will you help me make it dance?

 

Other Ways You Can Help *

If you are like me and just aren't sitting on a ton of extra dollars ----there are other ways you can help me.

  • spread the word about my campaign- spin my music- share the songs <3

ok, if that didn't explain everything please email me bpfantzmusic@gmail,com I would love to hear from you <3

dasss it. love y'all. <3

story:
In Short:

  1. Take a look around on this page
  2. Select a perk on the right side of the page that interests you
  3. Follow the instructions to process your payment/perk
  4. Be freaking awesome!
  5. Tell all your friends about it and encourage them to do the same!

 


About The Project

I'm Matt Madjerich, a rock artist from Pittsburgh Pennsylvania in the USA. Since I started in 2007 I've had the opportunity to meet a crazy amount of cool people at shows, play with bands I've dreamt of since I was twelve and have made a lot of new friends along the way. I've released two songs so far, Falling Behind and Ember.

From the very beginning I've worked my ass off to achieve goals. Multiple days and nights were spent crafting material, brainstorming, interacting with fans and so much more. All of that hard work has ultimately paid off and has allowed me to achieve things I've dreamt of for years.

It would mean so much if you were to help me achieve this next goal of mine.

One thing has always been a driving force throughout all of this: friends, family and fans. My newly acquired fans, my family and close friends have always had faith in what I do and what I believe in/stand for. You've all been extremely supportive, this means the world to me. This has given me the confidence and has gotten me excited to release more music.

If I manage to reach my goal for this album, I can share the recording-process even easier and better with the people who care most about me and my music than ever before.

 

What I Need & What You Get

Right now, I am nearly done writing for the album. I have selected a batch of songs which I feel best sum up the theme of the album and those are songs I would love to turn from demos into balls to the wall, Professionally mixed and mastered recordings. If I reach this goal, I will not only be able to have this full length album mixed and mastered properly, but also put out multiple singles with music videos, provide quality content and give back to those who have given me so much!


In exchange for your donations, you can get a variety of cool things from me, they're called perks.

 

From the top to the bottom of my heart, THANK YOU!

story:
Who is Tall Boy Special?

Glad you asked! We are three tall idiots who love to make people laugh.  We left our professional comedian jobs in Boston in late 2019 to try our hand at making it in LA. Then the world shut down. We spent our newfound excess of down time jamming by pools and drinking tall beers. Tall Boy Special was born out of a deep desire for creative output in a world that needed it most. We're very serious about our silly output. In the past year we've released two albums, Really Actually Beautiful and Monster Music, as well as four singles "Open Mic Night at the Chuckle Barn", "Hot Tub Hot Air Balloon", "Normal Day" and "Fictional Aisle", the latter of which blew up on Tik Tok and was featured on CBS' Funniest #atHome Videos hosted by Cedric the Entertainer. All of our music has been written, recorded and produced by us.

Where's My Money Going?

Great question, you want to get right to the point. While we've enjoyed our makeshift bedroom recording set up, we're ready for our art to reflect our professionalism. Our newest ideas are bigger than ever before and we're not equipped to realize them on our own. Your contributions will help us get into a proper studio to get our new music out to the world! In addition to studio time and post-production costs, your contributions will go towards hiring other creatives to aid in the realization of the project. Such artists will include session musicians, graphic designers, photographers and videographers. So really, your donation will be assisting a number of people.

Why can't you just record your music from your bedroom like you did before?

Okay. Fair question, but geeze. In recent months we've experienced some difficulties as a band for the best possible reasons. Johnny Mac just welcomed his beautiful baby girl Sophie into the world. He has relocated to MA and we are so proud and happy for him. And don't get it twisted, while we're all very busy on opposite coasts we still meet via FaceTime a few times a week to write songs. We've got a backlog of great new material and with your help we can all be in one place to make this music the proper way. And Zack and Alex get to meet Sophie. If you don't contribute you are barring Zack and Alex from meeting baby Sophie. C'mon.

Can't Contribute?

No Problem! All we ask is that you check out our music on Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon, YouTube, etc, anywhere music is found. If you like it, tell a friend about it!

story:
Who We Are:

Ferndale Radio consists of a group of friends who share a passion for music and the power of a local radio station. Our goal is to create a community hub in the heart of downtown Ferndale that encourages creativity through music, local issues, the arts and more over the FM airwaves.

What We Need:

Ferndale Radio needs a minimum of $15,000 to launch the station on 100.7 FM within the next 12 months.

We Need YOUR Support:

The money you donate helps Ferndale gain a valuable resource in promoting the community and allowing voices from all backgrounds be heard. Funds generated will cover the expenses of the equipment needed to launch the station, including:

  • Building materials for studio
  • FM transmitter
  • Broadcast antenna, tower and installation
  • Computer
  • Royalties and insurance

The Impact

If everything goes according to plan, 100.7 FM will be broadcasting live inside the Rust Belt Market in downtown Ferndale by the summer of 2017. Local bands and artists will have an outlet to have their music heard. Select volunteer DJs from the community will have the ability to share their passion with an engaged audience. Issues that affect Ferndale residents will be the main focus, and residents have a platform to address their opinions and concerns that will go unnoticed by the mainstream media.
